name: Alien Obnoxion
description:
My submission for the completed 3D Shooter!

I added Wallrunning, new music, a  new UI element, a voiceline, a miniboss and a new level.

Wallrunning is in level one. just jump at a wall, and then keep moving. You'll need it to cross a pit in the map. Miniboss is in level 2.  It summons a swarm of 5 flying enemies every time it's hit. there's a bug when you hit it with the electro gun, but it's pretty comical so I left it in lol. Check it out if you want :p. It also drops a key upon death that you need to progress in the level.

Level 3 music made by Farhan Parekh

Lavender UI element made by Farhan Parekh

MSU Assets used.

Thanks for a great semester, guys!
